page.title: 03Employment in Saline area
page.content: The major employer in the district is the National Coal Board. Comrie Colliery employs men on round-the-clock shift work. Local farmers are other employers, although the extent of their employment tends not to go beyond the immediate family. Saline Primary School has a teaching staff of ten, with a nursery nurse and teaching auxiliary. The janitor, kitchen and cleaning staff bring the number employed in the school to sixteen. Local shops including the Post Office and hairdressers,the hotel and golf club all give some part-time employment. The great majority of inhabitants of Saline work outwith the immediate district.
